Docs.summary: Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

Docs.summary: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.returns: if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
|Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|Not applicable.|
